name: Harsh Patel.
aboutp1: I am a full-stack developer with an inclination for machine learning. Currently, I am pursuing my Masters of Applied Computer Science at Dalhousie University, Canada.
aboutme1: Hey! My name is Harsh Patel and I like developing cool video games and applications.
aboutme2: My fascination with ethical hackers during high school sparked my early interest in programming. Soon after, I fell in love with Computer Science as I dived deeper into my bachelor's degree.
aboutme3: Fast forward to today, I have been a part of an amazing fintech startup Quicko as a full stack developer intern and have completed several other internships.
aboutme4: Following are the few technologies I have used recently:
workpointers: Building and developing PWA for Quicko's product: MEET
Using flutter for front-end development and NodeJS for backend and RESTful apis
Working in a fast-paced start-up environment and building quality product
Communicate with multi-disciplinary teams of engineers, designers and product managers on a daily basis
Worked as a Teaching Assistant of the Embedded Systems Design course for the Fall'21 semester
Worked as a research fellow under ITS research program during Summer'21 semester
Worked as a flutter developer under UGRP program during Summer'21 semester
corvitodet: An interactive website where an user can make and maintain different lists like watched list, currently watching and wishlist.
